chapters.name: Integers
learning_outcomes: Performs all four operations on integers.
Uses properties to simplify integer calculations.

chapters.name: Fractions and Decimals
key_topics: Operations on decimals in daily contexts
learning_outcomes: Solves word problems involving fractions and decimals.
Converts between fractions and decimals where appropriate.

chapters.name: Data Handling
key_topics: Bar graphs and double bar graphs
learning_outcomes: Organises data and represents it graphically.
Computes simple measures of central tendency.

chapters.name: Simple Equations
learning_outcomes: Translates verbal statements to simple equations.
Solves one-variable linear equations step by step.

chapters.name: Lines and Angles
key_topics: Angles formed by intersecting and parallel lines
learning_outcomes: Identifies angle relationships in given figures.
Uses angle properties to find unknown angles.

chapters.name: The Triangle and its Properties
learning_outcomes: Uses angle sum property to find missing angles.
Identifies medians and altitudes in triangles.

chapters.name: Congruence of Triangles
learning_outcomes: Checks congruence of triangles using side and angle data.
Applies congruence in simple reasoning problems.

chapters.name: Comparing Quantities
key_topics: Percentage and its conversion to fraction/decimal
learning_outcomes: Converts between ratios, fractions and percentages.
Solves problems on profit, loss and simple interest.

chapters.name: Rational Numbers
learning_outcomes: Represents rational numbers on the number line.
Compares and orders rational numbers.

chapters.name: Practical Geometry
learning_outcomes: Constructs triangles using SSS, SAS, ASA information.
Uses constructions to solve simple geometry tasks.

chapters.name: Perimeter and Area
key_topics: Perimeter and area of rectangles and triangles
learning_outcomes: Computes perimeter and area of standard figures.
Solves daily-life problems involving perimeter and area.

chapters.name: Algebraic Expressions
key_topics: Value of expression for given variable
learning_outcomes: Identifies parts of an algebraic expression.
Adds and subtracts simple algebraic expressions.

chapters.name: Exponents and Powers
key_topics: Laws of exponents (product, quotient, power of power)
learning_outcomes: Writes repeated multiplication in exponential form.
Applies basic laws of exponents to simplify expressions.

chapters.name: Symmetry
key_topics: Lines of symmetry in regular polygons
Symmetric patterns in art and design
learning_outcomes: Finds line and rotational symmetries in given figures.
Creates designs showing specified symmetries.

chapters.name: Visualising Solid Shapes
key_topics: Faces, edges and vertices of 3D objects
learning_outcomes: Identifies common 3D shapes and their nets.
Matches solids to their different projected views.
